update.description:
This is the next part of ign math integration. This pull request is long because changing public and protected functions in one class affects many other class. Functionality should not be affected.

**Changes that are made**

1. Deprecated public & protected functions that using gazebo::math.
1. Implement replacements for deprecated functions using ignition::math.
    - Some function names remain the same, but some accessors require different names.
1. Change internal usage of gazebo::math to ignition::math.


* [No gpu clean](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/384/)

* Works on Windows.
update.title: Ign math integration with common library, part 1

pullrequest.title: Ign math integration with common library, part 1

content.raw:
I'd prefer to not change both the function name and parameter types with the ignition::math conversion. It will be easier for people to simply change types instead of changing both types and function names. So, for the ignition math changes we are trying to only change types.

There are caveats when the function name has to change due to symbol conflicts. These are unavoidable, but should be kept to a minimum.
content.html:
I'd prefer to not change both the function name and parameter types with the ignition::math conversion. It will be easier for people to simply change types instead of changing both types and function names. So, for the ignition math changes we are trying to only change types.

There are caveats when the function name has to change due to symbol conflicts. These are unavoidable, but should be kept to a minimum.
